name: victor
description: A JavaScript 2D vector class with methods for common vector operations

scripts.build: (echo '/*!' ; cat ./LICENSE ; echo '*/' ; browserify index.js --standalone Victor) > build/victor.js && cat build/victor.js | uglifyjs -mc --comments '/^!/' > build/victor.min.js

author: Andrei D. Robu <andreidrobu@gmail.com> (https://andreirobu.uk)
